entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of showers later in the afternoon. Risk of a thundershower in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 24. Humidex 25. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Rain. Risk of a thundershower early in the evening. Fog patches developing in the evening and dissipating overnight. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Thursday 11 May 2023
